casebody.data:
D'ALESSANDRO
v.
D'ALESSANDRO. No. 72P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 7, 2016. Joyce L. Terres, Assistant Appellate Defender, for D'Alessandro. T. Miles Williams, Garner, for D'Alessandro, Christina. Teresa Y. Davis, Gastonia, for D'Alessandro, Christina. Adam D' Alessandro, for D'Alessandro, Adam.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of March 2016 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed and Existing Bond Extended by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of March 2016."
